room.name: Apartment 2305
room.desc: that you are standing in a small bachelor apartment. It is empty, except for a sole bureau sitting in one corner of the room.

room.name: Floor 23 North
room.desc: you're in a hallway which stretches to the North and South. To the North, the hallway turns left; at the South end is a door to the stairwell. Several nondescript doors line each wall, but the door you're infront of, is room 2305.

room.name: Floor 23 Elevators
room.desc: you're in a hallway which stretches to the North and South. To the North, the hallway turns left; at the South end is a door to the stairwell. Several nondescript doors line each wall, but the door you're infront of, is room 2305.

room.name: Floor 23 South
room.desc: you're in a hallway which stretches to the North and South. To the North, the hallway turns left; at the South end is a door to the stairwell. Several nondescript doors line each wall, but the door you're infront of, is room 2305.
